author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM LORENZO FORMS OUT IN THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC...
summary: ...TROPICAL STORM LORENZO FORMS OUT IN THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Oct 13 the center of Lorenzo was located near 14.2, -40.3 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL STORM LORENZO FORMS OUT IN THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Oct 13 the center of Lorenzo was located near 14.2, -40.3 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorenzo (AT2/AL122025)
